website_summaries.verdict: An innovative teeth whitening system that doesn't cause sensitivity and works well for most users.
pros: Utilizes LED light technology that's safe and effective
Device is easy to use and works in as little as 9 minutes per session
Many customers rave about the results
cons: May take a while for some users with tough stains to see noticeable results

customer_reviews.title: After 2 uses, whiter teeth, no sensitivity!
customer_reviews.text: If you're anything like me... I brush every day, twice/day, floss.. but still my teeth never seem to get white. Most importantly, they are so damn sensitive all the time. Crest whitening strips hurt more than when I had kidney stones, but this is something I was cringing about when I purchased them. I was so on edge about how sensitive my teeth would be........ literaly nothing. No pain. At all. My teeth are so much whiter and the sensitivity gel they give is incredible. <--not that you would even need it because the maximum strength gel doesn't hurt anyways! 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: William Clawson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for Snow system is not cheap but actually works
customer_reviews.text: Snow works the cheap stuff does not. Kit was expensive but unlike the cheap kits I had tried Snow actually worked. That you get what you pay for thing played out here lol. After 21 days my results were amazing! I watch Netflix and 30 minutes later I’m rinsing. Now I do it twice a week to maintain as I’m an admitted coffee junkie and coffee likes to stain teeth! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ReconBravo

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE PRICE, PLEASE SAVE YOUR MONEY AND RESEARCH OTHER BRANDS
customer_reviews.text: The whitening serum itself works great. However, the LED mouthpiece is made of very cheap quality. After using it a couple of times, it stopped working. SNOW did send me a replacement, and that one stopped working too! It's simply not worth a 150 bucks. Please research other brands that will do the same job at a fraction of the price. Frankly, I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: ADAM

customer_reviews.title: Double down on this product
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I have tried charcoal powder whitening strips other whitening kits with light and none I can say none have done a great job as this product. Money well spent after trial and error. I would have save me time, effort and money if I had just bought this product from the get go. Great job snow
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lara

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the sensitive teeth users. By the 3rd use, I noticed a difference already. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you buy extra refills keep in cool dry place so it lasts longer
customer_reviews.text: Worked for dentist 15 years ago this works amazing with the strongest strength love it
customer_reviews.author: Elli

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I hated my yellow teeth and the Dentist charges $400 for whitening. I wanted something that was easy to use at home and at a lower cost. This works!!!!!! Within a week I noticed my teeth looked whiter! And now, almost a month later my teeth are noticeably whiter! I never had any sensitivity either. Very pleased with this product and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Simono

customer_reviews.title: Great product...no sensitivity...time saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but bought anyway...I am glad that I did!! I use it twice a day before and after work. I am going to buy one for my daughter as well. NO Zingers, No large price tag for white teeth, and No sitting in the dentist office for an hour. Great product...love love love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: mxcomeon123

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pearly Whites!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the snow whitening system! It is so easy to use! I plug mine in to my phone and put my phone in my pocket while I clean house, Cook, or whatever I need to do. The time goes by so quickly. Everyone wants to know how I get my teeth so white. I highly recommend this product to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: "lbinyon51"

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with galaxy s9+
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I would change is the plug kinda crazy with four different charging ends but none that fit new galaxy s9+
customer_reviews.author: beamer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Snow Teeth Whitening Solution
customer_reviews.text: The solution is so easy to follow and the results are amazing. I opted to also purchase the advanced whitening and love the process. I would recommend this solution to anyone looking to whiten their teeth!!! I am getting one for a family member and have already recommended several friends to buy the solution. Eric Reddington
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I used it 1 time,, and it stopped working.,, it had a bad wire and wouldnt work..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non returnable. Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. Get professional whitening at the dentist and save your time and money. Can’t return it either.
customer_reviews.author: natali

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Can’t even tell a difference in my teeth. Like they’re not even getting more white. I feel like I wasted my money on this product!! I’ve used it for 30 minutes every day since I received it, and not a bit of difference. Extremely disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey York

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works!
customer_reviews.text: Snow is easy to use, and works! What I liked, as opposed to other professional teeth whitening products I have tried in the past, is that it does not irritate my gums. I love the results!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kasberger

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you put some chapstick on your lips, tend to get dry quick.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn’t think this product would work that well but after 2 days of doing a 30 minute session I can see the results and I’m more then happy with Snow!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie stone

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly !
customer_reviews.text: Already seeing improvements on my teeth after one use! Very easy instructions included in box. Good thing to spend money on !
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Even the packaging is great. So well designed and it really works! What are you waiting for? Buy this now!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! My husband and I both got a kit and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, not sure if the LEDs do anything.
customer_reviews.text: I have a strong suspicion that the LED mouthpiece is just a way to sell the gel that you can buy at the store. (Hydrogen peroxide)
customer_reviews.author: Benny Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not amazing at all
customer_reviews.text: I was and still am a shade 6 according to the chart that came in the box. I just went to dentist and had a cleaning. Got this kit after reading sounded great. But I didn’t notice and change after 5 treatments all within 2 weeks. No sensitivity, but no results. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Wish I didn’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see any of that so called great results every one are saying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product report
customer_reviews.text: Product did not whiten teeth at all after using it for 5 weeks as direvted very disappointed with product was a waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Paul Albro

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used it for 30 days for 30 minutes and it did not work at all . So disappointing to pay over $100 for a product that just doesn’t work AT ALL 🤦‍♀️ . I should have listened to the bad reviewed on here and saved my money . And to top it off , the gold serum tube it comes with , had no serum in it😩. Come on, That’s just ridiculous! Never thought SNOW would screw it’s customers that way😠.
customer_reviews.author: john sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great product and glad I took a chance.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this but being stuck at home made me take a gamble and glad I did. I drink a lot of coffee and tea for years and its been at least 10 plus years since I last whitening my teeth. The results are amazing and definitely recommended to some friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: You can’t reach anyone from the company if it is truly a real company I am questioning that.
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t process my entire order. Took all of my billing information which is correct. They say it wasn’t. I can’t get a hold of anyone to speak to. Left messages no one has replied. Be warned I don’t know if this is a legit company. You do have to use the whitening product frequently or keep up a regiment of use. The product was good I did see results. But now they messed up my order and I can’t get anyone to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it every day since receiving it and I see no results yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You got to have one of these
customer_reviews.text: One of the best inventions in a decade. It's so easy to use and it only takes 10 mins to use.
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with extra strength serum...
customer_reviews.text: My kit never came with the extra strength serum, which sucks because after spending 150 bucks on something like this I’d expect them to not mess that kind of thing up.
customer_reviews.author: Cole M

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works
customer_reviews.text: My daughter’s teeth are really getting whiter. With patience, this product works.
customer_reviews.author: William Drury

customer_reviews.title: Rip off in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: After using this it made m teeth sensitive so I got more stained when I stopped
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Does work, caused lasting sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Totally didn't work, caused sensitivity on the edges of my teeth. No way to get a refund. I 100% feel so stupid for thinking it would work..
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Must stay plugged in while using the cord is too short to move around. Not returnable. No bueno!
customer_reviews.text: Have used 2 times. Bought this so I could whiten my teeth while putting my makeup on and getting ready for the day, however, the unit needs to plugged in while using, which would be ok, but the cord that attaches to the mouthpiece is so short , about 18" , so I can't move 1 foot from the plug. So very difficult to multitask while using it. Plus its not returnable, should have read that fine print!...so now I am stuck with it. Avoid if you plan to try to multitask while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Gogie888

customer_reviews.title: LED light stopped working after five uses - no response from seller
customer_reviews.text: Update: the seller did not respond to my message but did send me a new light that seems to be working fine after two uses. I wish they would have told me they were sending a replacement. Since I did not hear back from them I purchased a non-returnable replacement light on my own. With some communication I could've saved myself $20. First review: The LED light stopped working after 5 uses. The seller has not responded to my request for a replacement. This is not the experience I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: SethPie

customer_reviews.title: Device won’t stay lit
customer_reviews.text: Hi! My snow whitening will only stay lit for about 10 secs and I have to constantly keep unplugging from phone and replugging it back in! Could you please let me know how to return to receive a new one? Thank you Courtney Camp
customer_reviews.author: courtney camp

customer_reviews.title: $150.00 for 0 results...buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. I used this product 30 min everyday for four weeks straight. It did not do the job at all. Maybe a little whiter but nothing to brag about. I bought the strips....needless to say after two treatments with the strips, they got the job done and I’m satisfied. DO NOT waste your money on this product. Total waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive teeth
customer_reviews.text: I love the snow teeth washing system because it actually works without you having much sensitivity. I have major sensitivity in my teeth and I do it once a day and I’ve only had a little bit of pain but nothing serious
customer_reviews.author: Jules78

customer_reviews.title: OMG! They don't honor their warranty
customer_reviews.text: Mouthpiece went out in 2 days their customer service promises to contact me and never do if there really is one. But the better business bureau is next.
customer_reviews.author: Iishea Crayton

customer_reviews.title: HMMM....
customer_reviews.text: I think it was a waste of money. I used It for about 3 weeks and saw not much of a difference. Right now I am using a mixture of baking soda and peroxide once I finish my initial brushing, and I am seeing more of a difference than I did this, Can I get my money back?? lol
customer_reviews.author: Tee-Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I see no results at all used everyday for a week 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this stuff works! The absolute best thing about it is not only does it work but without teeth sensitivity. I’ve tried other products in the past but always have to stop using them because of tooth sensitivity. This gets great reviews in many of the leading magazines so I thought I’d try it. I’m glad I did. You can also go on amazon and just buy the whiting pens when you need refills
customer_reviews.author: hastings

customer_reviews.title: minimal discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Used it once so far and noticed a big improvement. Can't wait to use it again to keep making progress. Wore it for 30 minutes and had almost zero discomfort ( a tiny bit the next day). Very happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Shawn A. Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed in this product as it advertises to be the best of whitening products out there. I’m had for a month, have been using every night and not seeing any changes. While it’s easy to use the whitening is not what they advertise. Would recommend not spending the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Easy to use. Have experienced no sensitivities! Actually works great! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Good but doesn't whiten my teeth yet. Be careful of drool
customer_reviews.text: The product is Good but they don't tell you that it makes you drool after 10 minutes of using it. I drool after 10 minutes and wanna take it out. I like it I haven't grew to love it yet and I been using it now for 5 weeks and my teeth are still not white.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Martin

customer_reviews.title: This works.
customer_reviews.text: This whitened my teeth 2 shades (and they were pretty white to start with) - but they whitened my husband's FIVE shades after one use. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyneth Anderson

customer_reviews.title: No sensitivity, super white teeth within the first week
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it! I have sensitive teeth, especially when it comes to teeth whitening and I have zero sensitivity with Snow! I have used this for about 14 days now and I haven't been consistent with it lately but my teeth stay white. I use it for 21 mins a day and so far my teeth are about 5 shades whiter. I didnt have horrible teeth before I started using this but with how white my teeth are now my before pictures look yellow! Take pictures if you want to really see the difference because its hard to tell a major difference when you just look in the mirror every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this teeth whitening product, i have sensitive teeth and it doesn't bother me one bit. I saw results after my second time using it. And i love how it comes with a tooth color scale to compare before and after.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Bell

customer_reviews.title: Love it but not so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this product i could feel it whitening my teeth but the one thing i don't like is how hard it is to keep all of the whitening gel in place as you whiten because the mouthpiece is so big, at least for my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Snow
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product. Little pricey. I have been using for about 3 weeks now and can tell a big difference in the whitening of my teeth. I really like this product. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette C Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Snow really works
customer_reviews.text: After only 1 week I can see my teeth look a few shades whiter. Snow works!!!
customer_reviews.author: CHUCK

customer_reviews.title: Charger :(
customer_reviews.text: The only negative review I’ll give to this product is the cable, I get Tangled with the cable and if I use my iPhone the light goes off after a few minutes, sometimes it goes on and off it’s a hassle. I do like the fact that it doesn’t affect my teeth because they are sensitive so that’s good! I wish I could have purchased the wireless one :(
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I only write reviews on something I would buy again and recommend. This product has really been amazing, I can definitely see a huge improvement. Not sure how to upload before and after.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M. Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great Vendor/ Incredible Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It works! East Coast Health and Beauty are sincerely the best experience I’ve had with a distributor on Amazon. Hands down!
customer_reviews.author: David Thigpen

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I like the product overall. I found it difficult to hold the mouth piece in my mouth for long periods of time. But I have seen a difference in my teeth. I would say that this product is a good investment because I feel more confident now that I have a fresh looking smile. I’m a coffee drinker and we all know how coffee can stain your teeth. This product gives me the opportunity to not have to give up drinking coffee and still maintain my teeth white.
customer_reviews.author: Janin

customer_reviews.title: Did not whiten my teeth much
customer_reviews.text: This did not whiten my teeth as much as I expected. Even using the extra strength pen for 30 minutes, along with the led light, only whitened my teeth barely 2 shades.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: It works well and the price is very reasonable compared to going to the dentist 👍
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good; I’ve been using this for two weeks with the maximum strength and my teeth are definitely whitening.... Yay 😁
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Bruhn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like how it is easy to use and super cool Looking. The only thing I don’t like is the price may be a little high but I guess there is a saying you get what you pay for. Thank you snow and amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jed Padama

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up !
customer_reviews.text: Kit came superrrr fast! Everything in the kit as promised I’ve only used it twice but I’ve definitely seen whiter results already but the LED Light is SUPER BRIGHT and strong !! Won’t regret
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Peters

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm optimistic how well this product will work. The procedure is easily understood. The price and delivery was just right
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anderson

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T Work!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but doesn't work! Unfortunately!!! I bought thinking it would because of the reviews on here and I saw it on a show.
customer_reviews.author: Soraisha

customer_reviews.title: I was not pleased with this product, because the mouth piece did not light up.
customer_reviews.text: The mouth piece did not light up, and amazon said I could not return it. Amazon if your listening pls help. memacain@ icloud.com
customer_reviews.author: Gary A Cain

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I had very gray and yellowish teeth. Some is hereditary and some from coffee, etc. I used this 3 times and it was amazing. My only thought would be if it were wireless it would be so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be a good product. The mouth guard shuts off and the the light seems to short out. When i opened the package the tube for extra whitening was leaking a rust color. I tried to use the device, but it just doesn't work. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Zero sensitivity, amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I have very sensitive teeth and normal when I use any whiting products I have sensitivity. With snow I have had ZERO sensitivity which has been amazing and I also after a week have gone three shades lighter.
customer_reviews.author: ALLIE

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!!! Thanks 😊
customer_reviews.text: Follow the directions and you won’t be disappointed. I love this whitening system. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: does not work, makes you drool, just putting the gel on my teeth was sensitive (more than any whitening strips i've used in the last 15 years) also started making my mouth throb. would not recoomend
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality and already broken!
customer_reviews.text: I received it four months ago and already it doesn’t work! I cannot get the cord to turn the mouthpiece blue. Very disappointed for that much money that it doesn’t work! Don’t get it!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!!! Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money! Not able to return the product!! Wish I had read this before I ordered ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dentist recommended
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended this product and it is working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: BROKE after 2 months or use
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product until it broke after 6 weeks. And returning product to snow seems to be a hassle and this also seems to be a know issue with the product. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: No worth the money. I used this system and still did not see any results. I will continue to use my whitening system that I received from my dentist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quit working after a week
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after a week. I tried to return it but it was non returnable. I contacted Amazon and am waiting for an answer
customer_reviews.author: jama hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful smile, sparkling white teeth.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked immediately. Have tried other products, but this is truly the best of the best. Price is alittle higher than others, but well worth the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: By far the best whitening product I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: MISSY

customer_reviews.title: Quick results
customer_reviews.text: Love it’s fast whitening ability. Easy to use, seeing quick results. My only concern is not being able to see the serum as the tube is turned to reveal more gel. Since it’s clear, hard to tell where you have or haven’t applied the serum to your teeth. But overall, pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Christine De

customer_reviews.title: better smile/white teeth
customer_reviews.text: I do like. the only thing I wish the cord was a foot longer, I walk around with the cord plugged into my phone, and reach for something and it unplugs. With the multi plugs, makes it very handy for different phones and computer. My teeth are whiter and is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Decot

customer_reviews.title: Its okay just stay with it
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would work like right away to a week...takes longer but I believe I see a difference
customer_reviews.author: Alicia campion

customer_reviews.title: LASTED ONLY 5 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Although this product worked well before it broke, the mouthpiece stopped working after only 5 months of light use. I tried contacting the seller twice for a replacement mouth piece, as they claim they will replace defective items, but I still have not heard back from anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jennabelle

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! No refunds allowed. Product sucks!!!
customer_reviews.text: No returns allowed. Very angry. Teeth too sensitive, light burns my mouth. Buyer beware!!!Cord is too short to sit comfortably with device on my mouth. Had to lay on floor to be near outlet. Really really sucks!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Great Surprise
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to use. Clear instructions and good value Would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Terry

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic.. I could literally see results from the first use.. I’m a smoker N it seems like sometimes my teeth get stained, but as soon as I get home and use it l, my teeth go back to the whiter shade!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: QUESTION
customer_reviews.text: I just received my kit, and I'm a bit confused. It came with 3 whitening wands, and it also came with 1 gold maximum strength whitening wand. How often do I use the gold one?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product. Hands down the best whitener I’ve used and I haven’t had any problems with sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Amazing worked in 2 sessions.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical if this would work as well as it was reviewed. After two uses I’ve been getting compliments on how perfectly white my teeth are. I do wish it came with a sanitizer for the mouth piece or at least had a option sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: KayKay411

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried three other teeth whitening systems, that really didn't have any discernible improvements. This one really works. My teeth are fairly white, a 3 on the scale, but I could tell a difference in days.
customer_reviews.author: Mari H.

customer_reviews.title: Good condition
customer_reviews.text: It good but not really white. But I still use them
customer_reviews.author: Lilya

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works well and I love that I can use my iPhone to power it
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kreidler

customer_reviews.title: Great whitening product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product due to good reviews. The product is very easy to use. Results were actually seen!
customer_reviews.author: jentullos1

customer_reviews.title: Order the wireless one!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but wish I had ordered the wireless one. The light goes on and off and I have to move the wires around to get it to light up again. I believe the on and off has deterred the whitening from being what it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Erickson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product works. I noticed a difference within three days. Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Really does work
customer_reviews.text: Great product I can already see changes and differences in the color of my teeth
customer_reviews.author: Amanda reyes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product - great results. Thank you clean and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: So worth it! I bought two kits for my daughters and they love it! Immediate results and did not affect sensitivity at all!
customer_reviews.author: christina whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've used it several times, and it's really easy to use. I like that you put the whitener on your teeth instead of on the mouth guard. I wish it was a little more effective on the whitening, but the lack of whitening could be due to loss of enamel on my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C

customer_reviews.title: Great product for great price and delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t believe how white my teeth were after 3 sessions. NO PAIN AT ALL!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of use, portability, and the simpleness of this product. The ability to use this from my phone is really a great flexible feature for people like me on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay won't work on my phone only the wall plugin that's inconvenient
customer_reviews.author: Connie nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice and already see a difference. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: ProShopper

customer_reviews.title: Pearly whites
customer_reviews.text: My beloved sister in law is very happy with her tooth whitening set!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette E.

product_meta.title: SNOW Teeth Whitening Kit with LED Light | Complete at Home Whitening System - Best Results - Safe for Sensitive Teeth, Braces, Bridges, Crowns, Caps & Veneers
feature_bullets: DENTIST-QUALITY RESULTS:​ Nothing’s a bigger confidence booster than bright, white teeth. But going to the dentist is expensive (goodbye $600) and teeth whitening strips don’t actually whiten — but our kit does. ​Our proprietary advanced teeth whitening system uses award-winning LED activating technology to offer professional results for as little as $1.50 per treatment.

JUST 9 MINUTES A DAY TO A WHITER SMILE:​ It’s easy — just brush your teeth, apply the proprietary teeth whitening gel, and let the USB-powered mouthpiece work its magic, while you catch up on your shows, work, whatever. Rinse, and you’re well on your way to a brighter smile.

SAFE FOR SENSITIVE TEETH, BRACES, BRIDGES, CAPS, CROWNS & VENEERS:​ Whitening your teeth shouldn’t hurt, and now it doesn’t have to. Designed with sensitive teeth (and gums) in mind, our whitening kit helps brighten teeth and remove coffee and wine stains — without causing pain. The Snow at Home Teeth Whitening System is also safe for braces, bridges, crowns, caps, and veneers.

NO “SOLD SEPARATELY” RUNAROUND:​ Our proprietary whitening system includes everything you need to get a whiter smile — faster. From the mouthpiece with patented LED teeth whitening light to the whitening progress tracker, we’ve thought of everything. The best part: You can get about 75 whitening sessions out of one kit. It’s worth every penny.

5-YEAR WARRANTY THAT WORKS:​ We’ve all been there — a product stops working. You contact the company, and it’s “conveniently” not covered. That’s not the case with us. If any piece in our home teeth whitening kit fails to do its job, we’ll replace it for free, just reach out to our friendly customer support team.
